verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Jehovah <WH3068>, I have called <WH7121> upon thee <WH2363>; Make haste unto me <WH238>: Give ear unto my voice <WH6963>, when I call unto thee <WH7121>.
Let my prayer <WH8605> be set forth <WH3559> as incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> thee <WH4864>; The lifting up of my hands <WH3709> as the evening <WH6153> sacrifice <WH4503>.
Set <WH7896> a watch <WH8108>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, before my mouth <WH6310>; Keep <WH5341> the door <WH1817> of my lips <WH8193>.

Incline <WH5186> not my heart <WH3820> to any evil <WH7451> thing <WH1697>, To practise <WH5953> deeds <WH5949> of wickedness <WH7562> With men <WH376> that work <WH5949> iniquity <WH205>: And let me not eat <WH3898> of their dainties <WH4516>.

Let the righteous <WH6662> smite <WH1986> me <WH2617>, it shall be a kindness; And let him reprove <WH3198> me <WH8081>, it shall be as oil upon the head <WH7218>; Let not my head <WH7218> refuse <WH5106> it <WH7451>: For even in their wickedness shall my prayer continue <WH8605>.
Their judges <WH8199> are thrown <WH8058> down by the sides <WH3027> of the rock <WH5553>; And they shall hear <WH8085> my words <WH561>; For they are sweet <WH5276>.
As when one ploweth <WH6398> and cleaveth <WH1234> the earth <WH776>, Our bones <WH6106> are scattered <WH6340> at the mouth <WH6310> of Sheol <WH7585>.
For mine eyes <WH5869> are unto thee <WH3069>, O Jehovah the Lord <WH136>: In thee do I take refuge <WH2620>; leave <WH6168> not my soul <WH5315> destitute <WH6168>.
Keep <WH8104> me from the snare <WH3027> which they have laid <WH3369> for me <WH4170>, And from the gins of the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>.
Let the wicked <WH7563> fall <WH5307> into their own nets <WH4364>, Whilst that I withal <WH3162> escape <WH5674>.
